articles.description: EA announced a free update for Jedi: Fallen Order on May 4. Moreover, EA CEO also declared the game a huge success, calling it a "rare achievement."
articles.content: Respawn Entertainment found success and favorable reviews when they decided to kick-start a fresh franchise with Jedi: Fallen Order. Players take up the role of Cal Kestis, a young Jedi Padawan, as he navigates through the Star Wars universe. The story is set… [+1679 chars]

articles.title: Millie Small obituary - The Guardian
articles.description: Singer whose joyful vocals on My Boy Lollipop took Jamaican music to new audiences
articles.content: With international sales of 5m copies in 1964, the year of its release, the hit single My Boy Lollipop, sung by Millie, who has died aged 72, opened the door for Jamaican music to the world, said the producer Chris Blackwell. He had flown the 16-year-old Mill… [+5327 chars]
